Reviews.Title: works great right out of the box
Reviews.Author: P. Jones
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV  to replace the bedroom "tube tv".  I got it for the USB interface.  It played .avi and all ther files correctly with vivid color and clarity directly from the USB thumb drive!.  I also got 28 digital channels from a non powered antenna.  Better than expected!!!!

Reviews.Title: Bad experience
Reviews.Author: James Wahl
Reviews.Content: This transaction was the single most worst experience I've ever had at Amazon.  Fedex could not deliver it to an address that one can bring up on Google without a problem, and the cust service was attrocious.  Avoid.

ProductInfo.Features: SAMSUNG UN22F5000AF 22" Class 5000 Series 1080p 120 Hz LED HDTV
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SAMSUNG UN22F5000AF 22" CLASS 5000 SERIES 1080P 120 HZ LED HDTV ESIEUN22
